trans-unit.source: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the globalization infrastructure of Web applications.
trans-unit.target: Definerer konfigurasjonsinnstillinger som brukes til å støtte globalisering infrastrukturen til webprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The GlobalizationSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `globalization` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Klassen GlobalizationSection gjør det mulig å programmatisk tilgang til og endre innholdet i den `globalization` delen av konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection"></xref> class by using default settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av standardinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: The GlobalizationSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren GlobalizationSection skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av ASP.NET Konfigurasjonssystemet.

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du hente en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection>klassen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the default culture for processing incoming Web requests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir standardkulturen for behandling av innkommende webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The Culture property returns the default culture for processing incoming Web requests.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kultur returnerer standardkulturen for behandling av innkommende webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The default culture for processing incoming Web requests.
trans-unit.target: Standardkulturen for behandling av innkommende Web-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the best-fit character encoding for a response is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om beste tilpasning tegnet kodingen for svar er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the best-fit character encoding for a response is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den beste tilpasning tegnkodingen for svar er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture*> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture*> properties should be based on the <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> header field value that is sent by the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskaper må være basert på den <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>feltverdien som er sendt av klientleseren.</xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableClientBasedCulture property is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A> properties are based on the <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> header field value that is sent by the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen EnableClientBasedCulture er aktivert, den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A>egenskapene er basert på den <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>feltverdien som er sendt av klientleseren.</xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> header value cannot be mapped to a specific culture, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A> values are used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>verdien kan ikke tilordnes til en bestemt kultur den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A>verdier som skal brukes.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.Culture*> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.UICulture*> should be based on the <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> header field value sent by the client browser; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> og <> </> *> skal være basert på den <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>Hode verdi sendt av klientleseren; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the default encoding for .aspx, .asmx, and .asax file parsing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir standard koding for .aspx-, .asmx- og asax-filen analyse.

trans-unit.source: The FileEncoding property specifies the default encoding that is used to interpret the data that is included in the .aspx, .asmx, and .asax file types.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FileEncoding angir standard kodingen som brukes til å tolke data som er inkludert i .aspx, .asmx- og .asax filtyper.

trans-unit.source: If the file encoding is specified in the Web.config file, the actual file must be saved in the same encoding.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen kodingen er angitt i Web.config-filen, må den faktiske filen lagres i samme kode.

trans-unit.source: Unicode files and UTF-8 files that are saved with the byte order mark prefix <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A> property are automatically recognized regardless of the value of the FileEncoding.
trans-unit.target: Unicode-filer og UTF-8-filer som er lagret med byterekkefølgen merke prefikset <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A>egenskapen gjenkjennes automatisk uavhengig av verdien for FileEncoding.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the FileEncoding property setting for the server or application is configured to use UTF-16, and if UTF-16 is not the encoding that is used for an .aspx page in the scope of the configuration file, the output that is sent to the client browser is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapsinnstillingen FileEncoding for serveren eller programmet er konfigurert til å bruke UTF-16, og hvis UTF-16 ikke kodingen som brukes for en .aspx side i omfanget av konfigurasjonsfilen, er utdataene som er sendt til klientleseren skadet.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, ensure that the configured FileEncoding value matches the encoding that is used in the .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: Derfor forsikre deg om at de konfigurerte FileEncoding verdien tilsvarer kodingen som brukes i aspx-siden.

trans-unit.source: The default encoding value.
trans-unit.target: Koding standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the content encoding of HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir innholdskodingen for HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The RequestEncoding property specifies the assumed encoding of each incoming HTTP request, including posted data and query-string data.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RequestEncoding angir den antatte kodingen for hver innkommende HTTP-forespørsel, inkludert postede data og spørringsstrengen data.

trans-unit.source: If the request comes with a request header containing a <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> field, the <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> field of the request header overrides the RequestEncoding of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forespørselen leveres med en forespørsel om toppteksten som inneholder en <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>-feltet i <xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>feltet forespørselshodet overstyrer RequestEncoding av konfigurasjonen.</xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader> </xref:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader>

trans-unit.source: The default encoding is UTF-8, specified in the `globalization` section of the Machine.config file that was created when the .NET Framework was installed.
trans-unit.target: Standardkodingen er UTF-8, angitt i den `globalization` i Machine.config-filen som ble opprettet da .NET Framework er installert.

trans-unit.source: If the RequestEncoding property is not specified in the Machine.config or Web.config file, encoding defaults to the `Regional Options` locale setting on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen RequestEncoding ikke er angitt i Machine.config eller Web.config-filen, koding standardverdien i `Regional Options` nasjonale innstillinger på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: For single-server applications, the RequestEncoding and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A> properties should be the same.
trans-unit.target: For én-serverprogrammer i RequestEncoding og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A>må være identiske.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using multiple server applications where the default server encodings are different, you can use local Web.config files to vary the RequestEncoding and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker flere serverprogrammer der standard server-koding er forskjellige, du kan bruke lokale Web.config-filer for å variere RequestEncoding og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.GlobalizationSection.ResponseEncoding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content encoding of HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Innholdskodingen for HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The default is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the factory type of the resource provider.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Fabrikktypen av ressurs-leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: The factory type of the resource provider.
trans-unit.target: Fabrikktypen av ressurs-leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the content encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir innholdskodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The ResponseEncoding property gets or sets a value specifying the content encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ResponseEncoding henter eller angir en verdi som angir innholdskodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The default encoding is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Standardkodingen er UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: The content encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Innholdskodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The default is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the header encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hodekodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The ResponseHeaderEncoding property gets or sets a value specifying the header encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ResponseHeaderEncoding henter eller angir en verdi som angir hodekodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The default encoding is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Standardkodingen er UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: The header encoding of HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Hodekodingen for HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The default is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the default culture for processing locale-dependent resource searches.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir standardkulturen for behandling av ressurssøk avhengige.

trans-unit.source: The UICulture property specifies the default culture for processing locale-dependent resource searches.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen UICulture Angir standardkulturen for behandling av ressurssøk avhengige.

trans-unit.source: The default culture for processing locale-dependent resource searches.
trans-unit.target: Standardkulturen for behandling av ressurssøk avhengige søk.
